titles.title: A bill to modify the flood control project for the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake, Georgia and South Carolina, to include recreation and fish and wildlife management as project purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from Army, OMB.

bill.summary: 6/2/1987--Introduced. Modifies the flood control project for the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake, Georgia and South Carolina, to include recreation and fish and wildlife management as project purposes.
